name: geonode.obapao.org
description: Web-based platform for sharing geospatial data, maps, and information on biodiversity and protected areas in West Africa, supporting conservation strategies and natural resource management, based on GeoNode technology and part of the BIOPAMA Reference Information System.
owner_name: BIOPAMA (European Union-funded, implemented by consortium of partners supporting West African states)
data_themes: Geographical names, geographical grids and coverages, services
